# Backend (Spring Boot)
########################

# Ignore Maven and Gradle build files
*.log
target/
*.jar
*.war
*.ear
*.class
*.db

# Ignore IntelliJ IDEA project files
.idea/
*.iml

# Ignore Eclipse project files
.project
.classpath
.settings/

# Ignore OS generated files (macOS, Windows)
.DS_Store
Thumbs.db

# Ignore Spring Boot specific files
spring-boot-devtools.jar

# Ignore local application properties (passwords, credentials)
src/main/resources/application.properties

# Node.js modules in case you're using Spring Boot with a front-end build tool like React
node_modules/

# Frontend (React)
####################

# Node.js
node_modules/

# Build output
build/
dist/

# Dependencies
npm-debug.log*
yarn-debug.log*
yarn-error.log*

# Logs
logs/
*.log
*.log.*

# OS generated files (macOS, Windows)
.DS_Store
Thumbs.db

# IDE and editor files
.idea/
.vscode/
*.swp
*.swo
*.sublime-workspace
*.sublime-project

# React and Webpack specific files
webpack-stats.json
*.tgz
*.bak

# Ignore environment files (if you have any)
.env
.env.local
.env.development.local
.env.test.local
.env.production.local



# Backend (Spring Boot)
########################

# Ignore Maven and Gradle build files
*.log
target/
*.jar
*.war
*.ear
*.class
*.db

# Ignore IntelliJ IDEA project files
.idea/
*.iml

# Ignore Eclipse project files
.project
.classpath
.settings/

# Ignore OS generated files (macOS, Windows)
.DS_Store
Thumbs.db

# Ignore Spring Boot specific files
spring-boot-devtools.jar

# Ignore local application properties (passwords, credentials)
src/main/resources/application.properties

# Node.js modules in case you're using Spring Boot with a front-end build tool like React
node_modules/

# Frontend (React)
####################

# Node.js
node_modules/

# Build output
build/
dist/

# Dependencies
npm-debug.log*
yarn-debug.log*
yarn-error.log*

# Logs
logs/
*.log
*.log.*

# OS generated files (macOS, Windows)
.DS_Store
Thumbs.db

# IDE and editor files
.idea/
.vscode/
*.swp
*.swo
*.sublime-workspace
*.sublime-project

# React and Webpack specific files
webpack-stats.json
*.tgz
*.bak

# Ignore environment files (if you have any)
.env
.env.local
.env.development.local
.env.test.local
.env.production.local
